availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer. Trigg County, Kentucky, native. Married to Catharine Gwynn Dodson. Father of John Edward Dodson, Sarah E. Dodson, William M. Dodson, Alice D. Dodson, George T. Dodson, and Charles Dodson. Farmer in Ballard County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Tharps District, p. 127.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County District 2, p. 34.
